author: Bernadette Giacomazzo #binders
text:
This shows us that:
a. Everybody has a breaking point, and for some of us, all it takes is one wrong move to never be the same again.
b. HEAL YOUR TRAUMA before you get into a relationship. Otherwise, it's going to hurt you even more. 

#StarWars #MayThe4thBeWithYou https://t.co/UTd5CcJvDe

author: Bernadette Giacomazzo #binders
text:
I hate to say it, but this generation never felt the effects of a consequence. Previous generations (especially Gen X) fought for rights because they knew what the consequences were without them.

I guess now we can stop coddling adults & start acting like sh*t matters? #RoeVWade

author: Bernadette Giacomazzo #binders
text:
A reminder, too, that prior to Roe, it was always legal in NY, & rich women (& the girlfriends/mistresses of rich men) EVERYWHERE had access to safe, clean procedures (as they were euphemistically called back then).

Start paying attention to your state governments. https://t.co/uUK4TvRHtj

author: Bernadette Giacomazzo #binders
text:
There are 2 parts that EVERY thread like this leaves out.
1. Rich women have ALWAYS been able to get abortions, regardless. 
2. This has NOTHING to do with evangelicals & everything to do with racists. The Supreme Court saw the same census we all did. They want more ⚪ babies. https://t.co/nvG2sIbf1r

text: The city of NY has it, too. It's just not always enforced except in super-extreme cases, because even the city knows rents are too damn high.
